bio:treatment.discussion: Carex pigra often associates with C. blanda and C. planispicata. The ranges of C. pigra, C. flaccosperma, and C. glaucodea overlap, although C. pigra is not commonly sympatric with those species. When growing with C. flaccosperma, C. pigra usually inhabits slightly drier sites, and when growing with C. glaucodea, C. pigra usually inhabits slightly moister sites. Carex pigra does not appear to form hybrids with either C. flaccosperma or C. glaucodea.
